resources.string: Is it at a Bar or Shop? *

What:
 Our app aims at allowing you to track the unique types of alcohol you like, and where you can find them! 

How:
 Click 'Add Marker', type in the required information and then update your map to display a pin in that location! 

What else?
 You can go into your preferences to update whether or not you only want to see bars or shops, and also if you would rather it display beer, wine or both! 
 
FAQ:
Do I have to be at a location in order to add a pin?
Currently yes, but if John Barr really wants, we can add this feature.

Who made this awesome app?
Nicole Lane & Will Suchanek
